Description: Validate details in Customs Form Excel against B/L, Invoice, COO PDF, and then internal Master Data Excel and Excel Calculation
Human effort (per month or per year):
3 declarations per month / 40 min per declaration / 
2hr / month
Remarks:
Extract date, permit number, and invoice number from Customs Form Excel to internal Excel Calculation

1) B/L PDF - alphanumeric shipment identification code (B/L no.) and date
2) Invoice PDF - country, quantity, 2 product descriptions. 1 of the product descriptions in the Customs Form Excel to be translated from Vietnamese to English
3) Arrival Notice PDF - Date, Vessel Name
4) Delivery Note PDF - If item is in Delivery Note PDF, it can benefit from EVFTA
5) Internal HS code Excel - classification number
6) Internal Excel Calculation - 3 duty amounts

Description: Validate payable duty amount in Import Declaration PDF against Shipment Tracking Excel and internal Excel Calculation
Human effort (per month or per year):
Before Python
5 declaration per month / 30 min per declaration / 
2hr 30 min per month

After Python
20 min per declaration /
1 hr 40 min per month
Remarks:
1) Extract alphanumeric document number, product number, and quantity from Import Declaration PDF and Shipment Tracking Excel into internal Excel Calculation to calculate 7 duty amounts (Python)
2) Validate 7 duty amounts between Import Declaration PDF and internal Excel Calculation

Description: Validate payable duty amount in Import Declaration PDF against internal Excel Calculation and Shipment List Excel
Human effort (per month or per year):
25 declarations per month / 12 min per declaration / 
5 hr per month
Remarks:
1) Extract product number from Import Declaration PDF into internal Excel Calculation (Python)
2) Validate 4 duty percentages and amounts between Import Declaration PDF and Excel:
a) Tariff duty percentage based on 4 text categories in internal Excel Table (liquor type, country, transport mode, product brand name). Existence of CNM (Certificate of non-manipulation) and Inbound Documents are checked separately.
b) Education, VAT (Value-added Tax) and Liquor duty percentage and amounts based on internal Excel Calculation 
Validate product price between Import Declaration PDF and Excel Calculation based on shipment arrival year
a) Alphanumeric shipment identification code (B/L no.) in Import Declaration PDF is searched in Shipment List Excel to find arrival year
b) If arrival year is in current year, validate product price in Import Declaration PDF against internal Excel Calculation
If arrival year is before current year, validate product price in Import Declaration PDF against Shipment List Excel
